trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform LINQ data operations.
trans-unit.target: Supporta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllare e fornisce un'interfaccia per i controlli con associazione a dati per eseguire operazioni sui dati LINQ.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls, and not as a programmable object in page code.
trans-unit.target: La classe LinqDataSourceView è progettata principalmente per essere utilizzato dai controlli con associazione a dati e non come oggetto programmabile nel codice della pagina.

trans-unit.source: Page developers typically use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control to interact with data.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine in genere utilizzano il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>controllo per interagire con i dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET data source controls contain one or more lists of data, represented by data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Controlli origine dati ASP.NET contengono uno o più elenchi di dati, rappresentati da oggetti vista origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView class extends the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> class.
trans-unit.target: La classe LinqDataSourceView estende la <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: It defines the capabilities of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control with which it is associated, and it implements the basic data functionality for the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Definisce le funzionalità del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>controllo con cui è associata e implementa la funzionalità dati di base per il controllo origine dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView class implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Delete%2A> operations.
trans-unit.target: La classe implementa LinqDataSourceView il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Insert%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Delete%2A>operazioni.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: It also implements sorting, filtering, and managing settings that are kept in view state.
trans-unit.target: Implementa inoltre l'ordinamento, filtro e la gestione delle impostazioni che vengono mantenute nella visualizzazione stato.

trans-unit.source: Although the LinqDataSourceView object is not directly exposed to page developers, many of its properties and methods can be accessed through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Anche se l'oggetto LinqDataSourceView non è direttamente esposto agli sviluppatori di pagine, molte delle relative proprietà e metodi è possibile accedere tramite il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView control implements the following data retrieval methods and events and exposes them to page developers and to other callers through the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo LinqDataSourceView implementa i seguenti metodi di recupero di dati e gli eventi e li espone agli sviluppatori di pagine e ad altri chiamanti tramite associato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>controllo: - il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating> event.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updating>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated> event.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Updated>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting> event.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserting>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted> event.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Inserted>

trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Delete%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleting>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleted> event.
trans-unit.target: -La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleted>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.Deleted>

trans-unit.source: You can sort the data that you retrieve with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control by adding an `OrderBy` clause.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ordinare i dati recuperati con il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>controllo aggiungendo un `OrderBy` clausola.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>

trans-unit.source: You can provide a sort expression for the LinqDataSourceView instance by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile fornire un'espressione di ordinamento per l'istanza LinqDataSourceView impostando il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>oggetto passato per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A>(metodo).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The syntax for the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A> property is the same as the syntax for a <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: La sintassi per la <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>proprietà corrisponde alla sintassi per un <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments.SortExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface and uses view state to track its state across page requests.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo LinqDataSourceView implementa il <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>interfaccia e utilizza lo stato per tenere traccia di stato nelle richieste di pagine di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>

trans-unit.source: Implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> methods are provided to enable view-state tracking for the control.
trans-unit.target: Le implementazioni del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.IsTrackingViewState%2A>proprietà e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A>vengono forniti metodi per abilitare la traccia dello stato di visualizzazione per il controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TrackViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.IsTrackingViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [Cenni preliminari sulla gestione dello stato di ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> class, setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control as the owner of the current view.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> (classe), l'impostazione specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo come il proprietario della vista corrente.

trans-unit.source: The LinqDataSourceView constructor is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A> method to return a new instance of a data source view with the specified `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Viene chiamato il costruttore LinqDataSourceView dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A>per restituire una nuova istanza di una vista origine dati con l'oggetto specificato `name` parametro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object is associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control at a time.
trans-unit.target: Un solo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>associato all'oggetto un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>controllo alla volta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object is always `DefaultView`, although this naming restriction is imposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> control, not by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> control.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>oggetto è sempre `DefaultView`, nonostante questa limitazione di denominazione viene imposto dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource>non da controllare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support views that use a different naming convention.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo per supportare visualizzazioni che utilizzano una convenzione di denominazione diversa.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource.GetView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> instance that is passed by the `context` parameter is used by the data source view to access parameter collections.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>istanza che viene passato per il `context` parametro viene utilizzato dalla vista origine dati in raccolte di parametri di accesso.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The data source control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo origine dati che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> associato all'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data source view within the scope of the data source control that owns it.
trans-unit.target: Un nome univoco per la vista origine dati all'interno dell'ambito del controllo origine dati che ne è proprietario.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Corrente <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo supporta l'operazione di eliminazione.

trans-unit.source: The CanDelete property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà restituisce CanDelete `true` se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableDelete%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, a delete operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, un'operazione di eliminazione può avere comunque esito negativo se le proprietà di dati associati non sono impostate o non sono impostate correttamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'operazione è supportata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo supporta l'operazione di inserimento.

trans-unit.source: The CanInsert property returns `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà restituisce CanInsert `true` se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert%2A>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableInsert%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, an insert operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, un'operazione di inserimento potrebbe comunque non riuscire se le proprietà di dati associati non sono impostate o non sono impostate correttamente.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'operazione è supportata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports paging of retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo supporta il paging dei dati recuperati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object always supports paging even if data presentation control does not use paging.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>oggetto supporta sempre il paging anche se il controllo della presentazione di dati utilizza il paging.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A> property is set to `false`, you can manually page the data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A>è impostata su `false`, è possibile pagina manualmente i dati di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports retrieving the total number of data rows, in addition to retrieving the data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo supporta il recupero del numero totale di righe di dati, oltre al recupero dei dati.

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the total number of rows that can be paged to determine how to render paging controls.
trans-unit.target: Controlli con associazione a dati utilizzano il numero totale di righe che possono essere trasferite per determinare come eseguire il rendering di controlli di spostamento.

trans-unit.source: For example, this value is used to determine how many numeric pager buttons to render in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control pager.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, questo valore viene utilizzato per determinare il numero di pulsanti del pager numerico per il rendering in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>pager di controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A> property is set to `false`, you must manually set the total row count in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A>è impostata su `false`, è necessario impostare manualmente il numero totale di righe <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the retrieved data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo supporta una visualizzazione ordinata dei dati recuperati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView> object always supports sorting even if data presentation control does not use sorting.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>oggetto supporta sempre l'ordinamento, anche se il controllo della presentazione di dati non utilizza l'ordinamento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort%2A> property is set to `false`, you can manually sort the data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort%2A>è impostata su `false`, è possibile ordinare manualmente i dati di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.AutoSort%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> oggetto associato all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> controllo supporta l'operazione di aggiornamento.

trans-unit.source: The CanUpdate property returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableUpdate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CanUpdate restituisce il valore di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableUpdate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.EnableUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, an update operation can still fail if the associated data properties are not set or are not set correctly.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, un'operazione di aggiornamento può avere comunque esito negativo se le proprietà di dati associati non sono impostate o non sono impostate correttamente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after an instance of the context type object has been created.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica dopo aver creata un'istanza dell'oggetto di tipo di contesto.

trans-unit.source: Handle this event if you want to validate the data context object, or if you want to handle exceptions that were thrown during the context creation.
